SELECT c.club_no clubNo , c.club_name clubName , c.club_content clubContent , c.club_Room clubRoom , c.professor_no professorNo , p.professor_name professorName , c.create_date createDate , c.update_date updateDate
FROM club c
LEFT JOIN professor p ON c.professor_no = p.professor_no
